reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Beginner Headphones
reviews.reviewText: These are cute and a good price for a toddlers first pair of headphones. I bought these for my 3 year old daughter to wear in the car because she doesn't want to hear my music but I don't want to listen to mickey mouse every second I'm in the car. They have lasted a long time and still work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My sister has been using it for two years and still works as well as when we bought it. The sound is still good the durability is amazing. The amount of times she dropped it and still fine is insane. Recommend for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work perfectly
reviews.reviewText: They are easy to use, very durable as they still work after two years. They fit great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT Volume Limiting so beware when kids use
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. I have purchased these for my 21 month old and also 2 additional pairs for friend's kids. I will say that these are not quite volume limiting. I turned the sound up all the way to test it out and it was blasting in my ear. It was closer to the level I would personally listen to music/tv on a plane and nowhere appropriate for sensitive little ears. I would recommend you monitor your children closely when wearing these to ensure they don't accidentally increase the volume. Research recommends that the child should still be able to hear and respond to you with headphones on to ensure they are at a safe level. My son loves these and they fit his little head well. The cord is soft which is nice because I'm hoping it doesn't fray as easily as most wires do over time. The cord is a good long length making it convenient to set the tablet at different distances. I do think the cord has a slight smell but nothing alarming. I read a lot of review prior to purchasing and will be monitoring for the earphones shorting out on one side. For all of the items I purchased the 2 and 3 year protection plans just in case. They were only a couple of dollars so worth it for peace of mind should you have to replace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Updated: Quick seller response helped! Stopped working after 6 months
reviews.reviewText: Update: the seller reached out quickly and sent us a replacement cord as well as headphones. The original headphones were indeed faulty: we are using the replacements. These are comfortable and our kids like the colors a lot. Thank you!We bought these for our 6 yo and were very happy at first: compact, easy to use and easy to share the sound by plugging into our son's headphones. Perfect for road trips and air travel. Great.Except the right ear stopped working today. Tried a different cable, different devices, nothing. Pretty annoyed that these didn't last that long. Our daughter is pretty bummed out - she really likes them and took good care of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for little littles!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this brand of children's headphones. Our first pair was purchased about 3 years ago and they still work great. Purchased a second pair for the 2nd little as the price is excellent, quality is great, and the fact that you can fold them makes them even better!Good fit for both of my kids- ages 5 and the other almost 2. I love how comfortable these headphones are for their ears! Sound quality is perfect for kids! It was still great using a splitter for one ipad and two kids with both sets of headphones being loud enough over the white noise of an airplane while being used simultaneously (I used this splitter: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07431YDWM/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o08_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1).Highly recommend for little kids headphones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought the headphones for my grandchildren and they were perfect. Each child could do there own thing without disturbing the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Red matches red
reviews.reviewText: The red headphones match perfectly to the red Tonies box! We love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2017
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these for our kids to take on holiday. They were a lifesaver on the airplane! They watched movies on their iPads and were so pleased to have their own special headphones. They are super comfortable and adjustable for different head sizes, the sound is really good, and they store away neatly. The colours are great. Very pleased with our purchases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 17, 2017
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for my boys troughs 2 tear old. We have had these for months and they haven't broken yet. Rarely fall off her head and the sound quality is wonderful. Lead is detachable to prevent risk of strangulation. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for young teenager. Cord appears very robust compared to wired earphones. I like the detachable tcord as it allows easy replacement of cord if damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 26, 2020
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality and he loved them
reviews.reviewText: Has survived a 2 week holiday in the hands of my 3 year old and it has survived ! Great quality and he loved them !
